visuscript.cli package

Submodules

visuscript.cli.visuscript_cli module

This is the core Visuscript CLI utility, which creates a movie from a Python script. See Scene for writing such a script.

Technically, this utility could create a movie from any Python script that outputs a stream of SVG elements to visuscript.config.config.canvas_output_stream; however, this is automatically done by Scene.

visuscript.cli.visuscript_cli.main()

Module contents

The Visuscript CLI utility for creating movies from a Python script.
